content:
TITLE: Installing AI Shell Package
DESCRIPTION: Command to globally install the AI Shell package using npm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/builderio/ai-shell/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm install -g @builder.io/ai-shell
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring OpenAI API Key
DESCRIPTION: Command to set up the OpenAI API key for AI Shell functionality.
SOURCE: https://github.com/builderio/ai-shell/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
ai config set OPENAI_KEY=<your token>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Basic AI Shell Usage
DESCRIPTION: Example usage of the AI Shell command for listing log files.
SOURCE: https://github.com/builderio/ai-shell/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
ai list all log files
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Checking and Updating AI Shell
DESCRIPTION: Commands to check the current version and update AI Shell to the latest version.
SOURCE: https://github.com/builderio/ai-shell/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
ai --version
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm update -g @builder.io/ai-shell
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Language Preference
DESCRIPTION: Command to configure the language preference for AI Shell.
SOURCE: https://github.com/builderio/ai-shell/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
ai config set LANGUAGE=zh-Hans
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing dependencies for AI-Shell project
DESCRIPTION: Installs all required dependencies using npm package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/builderio/ai-shell/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm i
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting up Node.js environment with nvm for AI-Shell
DESCRIPTION: Uses nvm to install and use the Node.js version specified in the .nvmrc file for the project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/builderio/ai-shell/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
nvm i
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building the AI-Shell project
DESCRIPTION: Runs the build script to bundle the package using pkgroll (Rollup), which infers entry-points from package.json.
SOURCE: https://github.com/builderio/ai-shell/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running AI-Shell in development watch mode
DESCRIPTION: Uses the watch flag to automatically rebuild the package when files change during development.
SOURCE: https://github.com/builderio/ai-shell/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm build -w
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the AI-Shell package locally on UNIX systems
DESCRIPTION: Executes the compiled distribution file directly as an executable in any directory on UNIX-like systems.
SOURCE: https://github.com/builderio/ai-shell/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
./dist/cli.mjs
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the AI-Shell package with Node.js
DESCRIPTION: Alternative method to run the distribution file using Node.js, suitable for non-UNIX environments.
SOURCE: https://github.com/builderio/ai-shell/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
node ./dist/cli.mjs
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Prettier globally for AI-Shell linting
DESCRIPTION: Installs the Prettier code formatter globally to ensure code style consistency.
SOURCE: https://github.com/builderio/ai-shell/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm install -g prettier
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Prettier on a single file
DESCRIPTION: Formats a single JavaScript file according to the project's code style using Prettier.
SOURCE: https://github.com/builderio/ai-shell/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
prettier --write path/to/your/file.js
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Prettier on multiple files
DESCRIPTION: Formats multiple JavaScript files in the source directory according to the project's code style using Prettier's glob pattern.
SOURCE: https://github.com/builderio/ai-shell/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
prettier --write "src/**/*.js"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Express Redirect Example
DESCRIPTION: Code example showing how to implement a URL redirect in Express.js.
SOURCE: https://github.com/builderio/ai-shell/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
app.get('/oldurl', (req, res) => {
  res.redirect('/newurl');
});
```
